com.vechain.thorclient.utils.crypto

Class ECDSASign

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vechain.thorclient.utils.crypto.ECDSASign

  • public class ECDSASign
extends Object
    Sign a message with ECDSA algrithm and secp256k1 curve.

      • signMessage

                                                  ECKeyPair keyPair)

      • signMessage

        public static ECDSASign.SignatureData signMessage(byte[] message,
                                                  ECKeyPair keyPair,
                                                  boolean needToHash)
                                           throws ECDSASign.SignException
        Sign the message with ECKeyPair. Only recovery id 0 or 1 is accepted, otherwise the method will continue to retry to sign til get recovery id is 0 or 1.
        Parameters:
        message - message to be signed.
        keyPair - ECKeyPair
        needToHash - set if the message to be hashed before signing. If it is true, hashed first,then sign. If it is false, signed directly.
        Returns:
        signature data which contains 32 bytes r, 32 bytes s, 1 byte v.
        Throws:
        ECDSASign.SignException

      • recoverFromSignature

        public static BigInteger recoverFromSignature(int recId,
                                              ECDSASignature sig,
                                              byte[] message)
        Recover the public key from signature and message.
        Parameters:
        recId - recovery id which 0 or 1.
        sig - ECDSASignature a signature object
        message - message bytes array.
        Returns:
        public key represented by BigInteger
